sn7.12:1.2: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena udayassa brāhmaṇassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami.
sn7.12:1.3: Atha kho udayo brāhmaṇo bhagavato pattaṃ odanena pūresi.
sn7.12:1.4: Dutiyampi kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena udayassa brāhmaṇassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami …pe…
